explains: n. 关于（pertain 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Living conditions are vastly different from those pertaining in their country of origin.
sentences.cn: 生活条件与他们祖国大不相同。

sentences.en: Prior to the interview, acquaint yourself with the laws pertaining to job discrimination.
sentences.cn: 面试前，先熟悉与工作歧视有关的法律。

sentences.en: We all have goals pertaining to our role.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都有与我们的角色相关的目标。
